subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: Young, once considered the future of American tennis, trailed 11th-seeded Gilles Simon by two sets and dropped the first three games of the third before bouncing back for a victory.
snippet: Young, once considered the future of American tennis, trailed 11th-seeded Gilles Simon by two sets and dropped the first three games of the third before bouncing back for a victory.
